description: An alternative take on tacos, try these crunchy tostadas with delicate white fish packed with flavour. A quick simple recipe to put together and serve up for dinner or to be shared with friends.
name: Baja Fish Tostadas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 small corn street tacos, spray with olive oil
400g flat head fish, cut into 5cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Line tacos on a baking tray single layer and lightly spray with olive oil.
Bake for 5min to 10min until the tacos get crispy, remove from oven and leave to cool.
Roll the fish in the MasterFoodsTM Taco Seasoning until evenly coated.
Heat olive oil in a shallow based frying pan on medium.
Add fish and cook for 3min to 5min until just cooked, squeeze over lime, remove and place onto paper tower.
Assemble each tostada with a generous dollop of avo-mayo, slaw, top with fish, more lime juice, garnish with coriander and serve.
